Sentence.value: - If you are having major surgery, you will stay in the hospital after the surgery.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - If you are having [[major surgery|C0679637]], you will stay in the hospital after the [[surgery|C0543467]].

Sentence.value: - Talk to you about the anesthesia you will get for your surgery.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - Talk to you about the [[anesthesia|C0002903]] you will get for your [[surgery|C0543467]].

Sentence.value: If you are going home, you will be discharged after: - You can drink water, juice, or soda - You have received instructions for a follow-up appointment with your doctor, any new prescription medicines you need to take, and what activities you can or cannot do when you get home If you are staying at the hospital, you will be transferred to a hospital room.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: If you are going home, you will be discharged after: - You can drink water, juice, or soda - You have received [[instructions|C1186996]] for a follow-up appointment with your doctor, any new prescription medicines you need to take, and what activities you can or cannot do when you get home If you are staying at the [[hospital|C0019994]], you will be transferred to a hospital room.
